text: Singapore Life Church offers a serene and elegant setting for wedding ceremonies. Its classic architecture, warm ambiance, and spacious interior create a perfect backdrop for a meaningful celebration. The staff are supportive and attentive, ensuring a smooth and memorable experience.

The kuay chap is one of the most flavorful I’ve had! The pork innards were clean with no unwanted smell, and the chili sauce perfectly complemented the dish. I’ve been eating it since I was pregnant with my 12-year-old whenever I had cravings. Definitely worth trying!
Amazing Grace with plentiful God blessing. Visit us with safe management plan in place for covid 19
I go to this church and there are always fun activities for us to play! You must come!!!!
Very cool facade design building.I didn't go inside but very interesting one.
